metadata.description: Looking for Olive Garden coupons? We've got the latest promo codes for 2025, including 20% off and free appetizers. Get your discounts here!
metadata.pageGoal: Provide users with the latest Olive Garden coupons and promo codes to encourage online orders and dine-in visits.

items.question: How do I get Olive Garden coupons?
items.answer: Join the Olive Garden eClub on their website! They'll send exclusive coupons and offers right to your inbox.

items.question: Does Olive Garden have a rewards program?
items.answer: They don't have a traditional rewards program, but the eClub is where it's at for special offers and promotions.
